name: as-custom-element
description: Setup any element as if it was a Custom Element

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:esm && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.size: cat min.js | gzip -9 | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && cat es.js | gzip -9 | wc -c && cat es.js | brotli | wc -c && cat esm.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
